briefdescription.para: Opaque type for the XSApplication objects.

detaileddescription.para:
You must call this function when exiting your application, instead of the classic 'exit()' function, so the auto-released memory is reclaimed, and the threads are terminated properly.
void

memberdef.argsstring: (XSApplication xsThis, const char *name, XSApplicationArgumentType type, const char *help)
memberdef.name: XSApplication_RegisterArgument

detaileddescription.para:
You must call this function before using any other XSFoundation function or object. Note that an auto-release pool is automatically created, so the auto-release features are enabled by default.
argc
The number of CLI arguments
argv
The CLI arguments array
The application object
